entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
